scripts.build:product: npm --prefix React-Product-Page install && npm --prefix React-Product-Page run build
scripts.build:movie: npm --prefix Movie-Project   install && npm --prefix Movie-Project   run build
scripts.copy:product: rm -rf portfolio/public/productpage && mkdir -p portfolio/public/productpage && cp -R React-Product-Page/build/. portfolio/public/productpage
scripts.copy:movie: rm -rf portfolio/public/movie       && mkdir -p portfolio/public/movie       && cp -R Movie-Project/dist/.   portfolio/public/movie
scripts.copy:rawr: rm -rf portfolio/public/rawr-you-the-one && mkdir -p portfolio/public/rawr-you-the-one && cp -R rawr-you-the-one/. portfolio/public/rawr-you-the-one/
scripts.copy:retro: rm -rf portfolio/public/retro                 && mkdir -p portfolio/public/retro                 && cp -R retro/.                 portfolio/public/retro
scripts.copy:Lynda: rm -rf portfolio/public/Lynda                && mkdir -p portfolio/public/Lynda                && cp -R Lynda/.                portfolio/public/Lynda
scripts.copy:Udemy: rm -rf portfolio/public/Udemy                && mkdir -p portfolio/public/Udemy                && cp -R Udemy/.                portfolio/public/Udemy
scripts.copy:pokemon: rm -rf portfolio/public/pokemon              && mkdir -p portfolio/public/pokemon              && cp -R pokemon/.              portfolio/public/pokemon
scripts.build:monorepo: npm run build:product && npm run build:movie && npm run copy:product && npm run copy:movie
scripts.build:monorepofull: npm run build:product && npm run build:movie && npm run copy:product && npm run copy:movie && npm run copy:rawr && npm run copy:retro && npm run copy:Lynda && npm run copy:Udemy && npm run copy:pokemon
